statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-5 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 2 , 14 \, x^{3} + 10 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x + 20 , x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , -x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x , 2 \, x^{3} - 20 \, x^{2} + 11 \, x - 10\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
